name: camo
description: Camo is all about making insecure image assets look secure.

CAMO_HOSTNAME.description: Unique key for this environment to sign urls with.

CAMO_KEY.description: The fully qualified domain name for camo to run on.

CAMO_LENGTH_LIMIT.description: The maximum Content-Length that camo will proxy in bytes

CAMO_LOGGING_ENABLED.description: Toggle whether or not to log verbosely('debug' or disabled').

CAMO_MAX_REDIRECTS.description: The number of redirects that camo should follow

CAMO_SOCKET_TIMEOUT.description: The number of seconds to wait for socket connection errors

RAILS_ENV.description: The RAILS environment for this installation
